hero.headlineGym4: Unless you give them a reason to stay.
hero.subheadlineGym: Stories, Chat and Social Feed that create the same hook as Instagram. But inside your gym. +1,200 gyms already increased their retention 60%.
hero.subheadlineTrainer: The all-in-one platform for personal trainers who want to scale their business without losing personalized attention. Nutrition plans, chat, payments in one place.
hero.bridgeText: But first, let's talk about the elephant in the room...

problem.subtitle1: Right now, as you read this, there are members at your gym who:
problem.subtitle2: You know it. You just don't know WHO they are.
problem.subtitle3: It's this: Your members come in, work out, leave. No conversations. No friendships. No reason to stay.
problem.statLabelGym: warning signs the average member gives before leaving • Most gyms see zero
problem.statLabelTrainer: of your clients quit in the first 3 months
problem.issue1DescGym: The #1 sign they're about to quit
problem.issue1TitleTrainer: Client finishes session → Goes home → Opens Instagram
problem.issue1DescTrainer: Forgets you exist until next week. No daily connection, no accountability.
problem.issue2DescGym: 0 out of the last 5 emails were read
problem.issue2TitleTrainer: You send a WhatsApp → Gets lost in 47 other chats
problem.issue2DescTrainer: Your nutrition plan, workout reminder, motivation message—all buried in group chats and memes.
problem.issue3DescGym: Comparing prices with other gyms nearby
problem.issue3TitleTrainer: They miss a week → Feel awkward → Stop coming
problem.issue3DescTrainer: The guilt spiral. One missed session becomes two, becomes ghosting. You lose them because there's no easy way back in.
problem.question: Sound familiar?

solution.title1: Turn Your Gym Into a Community
solution.subtitleGym: Imagine if your members looked at your app the way they look at Instagram. Stories. Chat. Social feed. Real-time updates. All the psychology that makes apps addictive—now working FOR your retention. 1,200+ gyms already made the switch.
solution.subtitleTrainer: Stop juggling 7 apps. WhatsApp for chat. Excel for diets. Venmo for payments. Instagram for content. GymFlow puts everything in one place: client messaging, nutrition plans, payments, and your own content platform. 500+ trainers already simplified.
solution.before3Gym: Empty classes due to lack of reminders
solution.after1Gym: Daily engagement with Stories and Feed
solution.after2Trainer: Everything in one platform: chat, diets, payments

socialProof.title: USED BY 1,200+ GYMS ACROSS LATIN AMERICA

features.title1: Members Who Think About Your Gym Every Day.
features.title2: Here's How We Make It Happen.
features.subtitle: Each feature is designed for one goal: make your members think about your gym every day.

story.title: Stories That Disappear in 24h
story.desc: Share daily WODs, client transformations, training tips. Your members check stories every morning like they check Instagram.

chat.title: Instant Messaging with E2E Encryption
chat.desc: Your members write you directly. Trainers answer questions instantly. Group chats for every class. All encrypted like WhatsApp.

socialFeed.title: Your Own Fitness Social Network
socialFeed.desc: Personalized feed with posts, progress photos, achievements. Likes, comments and mentions in real-time. Build community without depending on Facebook or Instagram.

notifications.title: Push Notifications That Increase Attendance
notifications.desc: Reminders 30 min before class. Alerts when spots open in full classes. New event notifications.

liveActivity.title: Social FOMO: "Who's Training Now"
liveActivity.desc: Live dashboard shows who's at the gym right now. Creates social FOMO that motivates more members to go. Gamified consecutive day streaks.

classBooking.title: Book in 3 Seconds + Waitlist
classBooking.desc: Real-time spot counter. Instant registration. Smart waitlist with automatic notification if a spot opens.

whyRealtime.title: The Secret to Retention:
whyRealtime.intro1: Instagram, WhatsApp, TikTok. What do they have in common?
whyRealtime.pillar1Desc: Instant notifications = instant responses = hooked users. Speed creates the feeling of immediate connection.
whyRealtime.pillar2Desc: Feeds that constantly change give reason to come back every day. Like Instagram
whyRealtime.pillar2DescEnd: Stories: there's always something new to see.
whyRealtime.pillar3Desc: Seeing others training TODAY motivates you to go. FOMO (Fear of Missing Out) is the best personal trainer.
whyRealtime.statSubtext: That's +$50,000 USD per year for an average gym

howItWorks.step3Desc: Upload the WOD of the day, a team photo, or a nutrition tip. Watch your community come alive.

objections.title: You're Probably Wondering...
objections.subtitle: We answer the most common questions
objections.obj1Question: "I already have a WhatsApp group for my gym"
objections.obj1Answer: WhatsApp groups are chaotic, you can't moderate, and they mix personal with professional. GymFlow gives you a 100% professional and brandable space that your members associate only with your gym. Plus, you have engagement analytics that WhatsApp doesn't give you.
objections.obj2Answer: 89% of our users activate the app in the first week. Why? Because it gives them immediate VALUE: see the WOD, book classes, chat with their trainer. It's not "another app", it's THEIR gym's app.
objections.obj3Question: "How much does it cost? Is it too expensive?"
objections.obj3Answer: An average member pays $50-100/month. If GymFlow helps you retain just 5 extra members per month, it already paid for itself. Most gyms report retaining 20-30 additional members. ROI is 10x to 20x.
objections.obj4Question: "I don't have time to manage another platform"
objections.obj4Answer: Setup takes 5 minutes. Publishing a story takes 30 seconds. And automatic notifications do the heavy lifting for you. Most owners invest less than 15 minutes a day.
